creator: thomas_kuczek@hotmail.com
text:
When uninstalling the RPM mod_jk2-2.0 with the command
rpm -e mod_jk2-2.0-1.0-1.4.0.2
you get this error message.

[root@server temp]# rpm -e mod_jk2-2.0-1.0-1.4.0.2
/var/tmp/rpm-tmp.51870: line 8: syntax error near unexpected token `fi'
/var/tmp/rpm-tmp.51870: line 8: `fi'
error: execution of %preun scriptlet from mod_jk2-2.0-1.0-1.4.0.2 failed, exit 
status 2

Greetings
Thomas

creator: hgomez@apache.org
text:
fixed in latest rpms which should be provided soon from jk 2.0.0 release

BTW, these rpma are pretty outdated, so better wait the one which will come 
with jk and jk2 release
